name: Alpine Ski Resort
description:
Eat as many humans as you can before too many escape.

Controls:

Left Mouse: point and click to move around the map.

Righ mouse: click to perform attacks in the direction you are looking

Instructions:

Eat as many humans as you can before too many of them escape.

Every now and then, once you've fed enough on human flesh, you'll get a choice of mutations which will increase your movement, camouflage and attack skills.

When given the mutation choice menu, you can pick a specific mutation by pressing either Q, W or E respectively.

Move around the map finding skiers and eat them by attacking them using right click. They'll eventually be covered by snow, but until then, other skiers will become scared if they see a dead body.

Skiers will also get terrorized if they see you (the monster). You can remain camouflaged by hiding inside the forest tree area. However, whenever you perform an attack you'll be revealed for a few seconds. As long as you are revealed, skiers can see you and get scared.

Scared skiers move faster than normal. So be careful as they will easily escape if scared.
